title: Intensive Workshop for Online Learning Design and Activity-Based Instructional Methods

context.prior_knowledge: Basic comprehension of secondary education curricula and experience with online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Mobile-based short-term course for current secondary education practitioners, emphasizing online-specific instructional design differentiated from in-person teaching

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more activity-based learning modules optimized for online environments.
Learners can apply two or more interaction strategies suitable for mobile microlearning content.
Learners can propose three or more instructional strategies to promote learner engagement in online learning design.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
